title: Marcelo Ebrard _ AcademiaLab
snippet: Marcelo Luis Ebrard Casaubón (Mexico City, October 10, 1959) is a Mexican politician and internationalist. He is a member of the Morena party.

title: Ebrard announces possible split with Mexico’s ruling Morena party | Courthouse News Service
snippet: MEXICO CITY (CN) — Mexican presidential hopeful Marcelo Ebrard started the week off by contesting his own party’s decision to put another candidate on the ballot in 2024 and threatening to leave to form his own movement. His comments came on the heels of the ruling Morena party’s announcement that former Mexico City Mayor Claudia Sheinbaum had won an internal poll, declaring her its official candidate in the coming presidential elections.

title: Mexico is Transforming for the Good | Dissident VoiceDissident Voice
snippet: Despite predictions that her gender and background would be detrimental, she and Morena candidates won the election by an even greater majority.
